issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
On opening a normal tabgroup fails. See screenshot.

With 3.1.2.GA it works fine
fields.summary: iOS: invalid type passed to function on tabGroup.open()

comments.body:
Hello 

I tested this issue. Itâ€™s working fine for me without any issue. 
 
My testing environment:

OS: OS X Version 10.8.4
Ti SDK: 3.1.3.v20130912171547
iOS Simulator: Version 6.0 (369.2)

Testing procedure: 

Just I create tab based default project form Studio. And I run this project.

Thanks

I have encountered this issue as well. 
Have tried reinstalling both Studio and SDK 3.1.3 multiple times.

- System: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
- Studio: 3.1.4.201310171935 (RC)
- SDK: 3.1.3 GA

Any ideas?
Closing this ticket as we have not been able to reproduce it and we have not received further information from the reporter.
